name: 桃子假象Peach Illusion
intro:
Peach Illusion 首张同名专辑「桃子假象」在七月随香香的桃子季上市。

圈圈温柔而少女气的词／曲 + C.c浪漫而多变幻的编／混 = Peach Illusion与你自在起舞的夏夜 

亦真亦假，冷暖变幻的城市里，充斥着纯真而甜美的假象。
午夜时分，摆脱了所谓“得体”的外壳，才似乎看到了朦胧而真实的世界。
不需要让所有人理解和包容，总有人愿意站在雨中，拥抱你的凹凸不平。
那么，在桃子假象里，你看到的又是什么？
（特别感谢：李春银桑／设计、小吉／琪琪音像、真真／Mia Clothing Store、陈振超／友情贝斯、胡大毛／Mix Studio录音室）

The eponymous debut album of Peach Illusion is released with fragrance during the peach season, July, 2018.

Soft & girlish Songwriting from O.o + Romantic & borderless Producing from C.c = Footloose Dancing Summer Night with Peach Illusion

Lingering around the edge of truth and the fluctuation of temperature, illusion with innocent peach sweetness is filling the city.
Midnight, we dance without the shell of normal elegance, it appears to a real world, albeit blurring.
Don’t need to be understood by everyone, as someone is standing in the rain, ready to embrace your shadow.
Alors…what do you see in the Peach Illusion?
Special thanks to Li Chun Yin Sang / Illustration Designer, Xiao Ji / QiiiSnacksRecords, Zhen Zhen / Mia Clothing Store, Soda Chan / Bass, Hu Damao / Mix Studio
